nodes.text: Robes of senatorial favor were a type of honorary robe intended to showcase an individual's exemplary service to the Senate of the Galactic Republic. Two sets of such robes were bestowed upon engineer Raith Sienar and Commander Wilhuff Tarkin by 29 BBY. Both recipients wore the robes while discussing the Trade Federation of Planets' fall from grace in the Republic.
Robes of senatorial favor appeared in the 2000 novel Rogue Planet, written by Greg Bear.
